group_1.narration: After leaving the maid cafe @and rushing to finish my errands,@I returned to Mikazuki Villa to help Yachiyo cook@for the visitors from Kirimine Town.
While helping out, talking about my new home@and all the people who’ve visited Mikazuki Villa,@I found myself adjusting to my new life.

group_1.textLeft: By the way, remember that girl who ran @in here yesterday?
I wonder what happened to her after she left.

group_1.textRight: Oh, the girl who was talking about her @arranged marriage?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, she was a bit of a crybaby whose family @runs a kimono shop in Mizuna.
I hope she had a good, long talk with @her parents…

group_1.narration: Looks like we’re almost done with the prep work…

group_1.textLeft: All that’s left is…[chara:100201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100201:cheek_0][chara:100201:face_mtn_ex_051.exp.json][chara:100201:motion_400][chara:100201:lipSynch_1]dessert.
It seems we forgot to buy the fruit…

group_1.textRight: Oh! I’ll go pick some up right away!

group_1.textLeft: Sorry to keep sending you out…@You’re a lifesaver.

group_1.narration: And so, I went shopping. @I couldn’t find the persimmons @that Yachiyo’s grandmother likes, @so I was heading to another store when…

group_1.textRight: Um, excuse me. Is something wrong…?

group_1.textLeft: Uwah… My phone isn’t working,@and I can’t find my mother anywhere…

group_1.textRight: Er… Are you lost?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah… I came to Kamihama City from a village @for a local trade exhibition…
But I got separated from my mother and I can’t @find where we were supposed to stay…

group_1.textRight: …Well, do you know the name of the inn?
I can look it up for you.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you…
I think…it was called Mikazuki Villa?

group_1.textRight: Huh… Oh, are you the guests from @Kirimine Town?!

group_1.textLeft: I didn’t realize you were from the inn, @it’s nice to meet you!
Ah, I am Shizuka Tokime. @May I ask for your name?

group_1.textRight: I’m Iroha Tamaki…! Please, let me show you @the way to the villa.

group_1.textLeft: You have my gratitude! If you don’t mind, @could I ask you for a favor?
Can you tell me more about this city?
I hardly ever leave the village, so I know little @about the outside world…

group_1.textRight: I wonder if I can be of much help…

group_1.textLeft: A food venue run by maids… @I can’t believe such a place existed in the city!

group_1.textRight: It was…my first time going to one too.
What’s it like where you live, Miss Tokime?

group_1.textLeft: It’s a village deep in the mountains,@where we forage and grow our own crops.
The rivers are full of fish… It’s a wonderful @place with lots of good food.
Everyone in the village is kind to each other, @like one big family!
Ah, and no need to be formal, @please call me Shizuka.
There will be plenty of “Miss Tokimes” @staying at the inn.

group_1.textRight: Do you…have a really big family?

group_1.textLeft: Well you see…In the Tokime clan you have @the main household and many branches…
Ah, I’m a daughter of the main line!

group_1.textRight: Oh wow!

group_1.textLeft: All in all, it’s really just one big extended family.
Although…there was once a time we had @lots of rules and regulations.
But all that’s just in name now. @These days we mainly focus on tourism.

group_1.textRight: I see… Is that so.

group_1.textLeft: I’m home!
Welcome back!@[chara:100201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100201:motion_0][chara:100201:cheek_0][chara:100201:face_mtn_ex_051.exp.json][chara:100201:lipSynch_1]…Who’s this?

group_1.textRight: I’m Shizuka Tokime! I’ll be in your care today.

group_1.textLeft: Aah, you know, your mother was very worried @about you.

group_1.textRight: Urgh… Mother’s really scary when she’s mad…

group_1.textLeft: Did you get all the shopping done?

group_1.textRight: Ah, well, I couldn’t find the persimmons @you asked for…
Persimmons…@[chara:102501:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102501:cheek_0][chara:102501:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:102501:lipSynch_1]In that case, I have something perfect!

group_1.textLeft: Is this...a giant orange?

group_1.textRight: It’s a specialty of Kirimine Town.
The shape may look strange, but it’s actually @a type of persimmon.
I’d still be lost out there without you, Iroha.
You even told me all about this city.
We brought a lot of these for the trade @exhibition.
I made sure we had some surplus stock,@so feel free to accept it.

group_1.textLeft: That would be wonderful, thank you.
